"Rediah": "You must be our new Meteorn arrival. Thank you very much for stopping by."
"I'm terribly sorry, but I still have a few things I need to prepare."
"Please come back another time, okay? I'll be here."
"Greetings and well met! I am Rediah, the ARKS Senior Support Informant."
"I offer helpful information to everyone in ARKS to improve their overall quality of life."
"Do you have any questions you'd like to ask me?"
"The Shop provides a wide selection of useful items."
"You should definitely browse them once in awhile."
"Please feel free to visit again at your leisure."
"I offer helpful information to everyone in ARKS to improve their overall quality of life."
"If you ever have any questions, please come and see me again, okay?"
